opis: ŠESTINSKA KUĆA NA TOP LOKACIJI Prodaje se dvojna kuća 220 m2 na parceli od 1500 m2, u mirnoj i zelenoj ulici na Šestinama. Kuća ima predivan pogled, puno svijetla i vrlo blagu kosinu vrta. Sastoji se od 3 etaže: Prizemlje: ulazni hodnik, kuhinja, ostava, kupaonica, radna soba, garderoba, spremište, soba s izlazom u vrt, terasu i dvorište. 1.kat: dnevni boravak s izlazom na loggiu i balkon s predivnim pogledom, kuhinja 2.kat (potkrovlje): 3 spavaće sobe (2 s izlazom na balkon), kupaonica. Kuća ima 4 parkirna mjesta u dvorištu i po potrebi se garaža može vratiti. Priključak za struju, vodu i kanalizaciju, plin se nalazi na cesti, grijanje na lož ulje (kotlovnica). Ostali detalji na upit. --- HOUSE IN ŠESTINE IN A TOP LOCATION A semi-detached house of 462 m2 on a plot of 1500 m2 is for sale, in a quiet and green street in Šestine. The house has a wonderful view, lots of light and a very gentle slope of the garden. It consists of 3 floors: Ground floor: entrance hall, kitchen, pantry, bathroom, study, wardrobe, storage room, room with access to the garden, terrace and yard. 1st floor: living room with exit to the loggia and balcony with a beautiful view, kitchen 2nd floor (attic): 3 bedrooms (2 with access to the balcony), bathroom. The house has 4 parking spaces in the yard and the garage can be returned if necessary. Connection for electricity, water and sewerage, gas is on the road, heating with heating oil (boiler room). Other details on request.
Grijanje: Sustav grijanja: Kotlovnica na lož ulje
